ubertip="When killed, this hero will come back to life and slow enemies in a 900 aoe by 40% for 5 seconds. On respawn, a reincarnated hero will resurrect with less HP and MP, equal to the same percentage of his MP at the moment of death. The minimum is 40%, the maximum is 100%. Allies who are near Skeleton King (within 1000 aoe) when slain become Wraiths for 3.0 seconds, delaying their death. They can continue attacking, casting, etc. When the duration ends, the hero dies, and credit for the kill goes to whoever landed the original killing blow.|n|n|cFF99CCFFCooldown:|r 220","When killed, this hero will come back to life and slow enemies in a 900 aoe by 40% for 5 seconds. Allies who are near Skeleton King (within 1000 aoe) when slain become Wraiths for 3.0 seconds, delaying their death. They can continue attacking, casting, etc. When the duration ends, the hero dies, and credit for the kill goes to whoever landed the original killing blow.|n|n|cFF99CCFFCooldown:|r 170","When killed, this hero will come back to life and slow enemies in a 900 aoe by 40% for 5 seconds. Allies who are near Skeleton King (within 1000 aoe) when slain become Wraiths for 3.0 seconds, delaying their death. They can continue attacking, casting, etc. When the duration ends, the hero dies, and credit for the kill goes to whoever landed the original killing blow.|n|n|cFF99CCFFCooldown:|r 120"
researchtip="Learn |cffffcc00R|reincarnation - [|cffffcc00Level %d|r]"
researchubertip="When killed the Skeleton King will come back to life and slow enemies in a 900 aoe by 40% for 5 seconds.
